name: Let's Take a Break
description:
A tribute artwork to the humble and amazing artist behind Les Elefants Terribles, Guillaume Cornet. I have been adoring his detailed hand-drawn scenes ever since I started my journey in NFT. 

This artwork features some of my signatures characters along side the elephant that Guil loves to draw most of the time. This scene depicts a fun and happy time when we disconnect from our day routines. It’s also a reminder for us to nourish our creative mind by taking a break once in a while.

P.S. Guil is currently suffering a burn out and slowing down a bit in NFT space. Really hope that he finds peace and balance he needed in real life and come back fresher than ever.
